data.persona: I am a guard from the castle. I carry a sword and shield when I am on duty. I am lonely and ramble in the company of a crowd.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Throne.
A golden throne be-speckled with many precious stones. It glints in every eye that falls upon it. It is 20 ft tall and 5 ft wide. Swords from enemies of the king line the back of the chair.
There's a sword, a jewel, a golden throne, and a precious stone here.
The queen and the visitor are here.

You are carrying a sword, and wearing a shoe and a shield.

data.short_motivation: I must follow the queen so we can speak in private.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the queen the precious stone I found to gain favor with her.
data.long_motivation: If the queen thinks fondly of me, she may appoint me to the queen's guard

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get queen's guard pin from queen
